url_slug: High-speed uni-traveling-carrier photodetector with the new design of absorber and collector  The 20th OptoElectronics and Communications Conference (OECC)  Shanghai, CN  This preseantation introduces the design of high-speed uni-traveling-carrier photodetector (UTC-PD) and three modified uni-traveling-carrier photo-detectors (MUTC-PDs) incorporating different doping profile operating at 1550 nm wavelength.
